settings.title: Our Story
settings.content:
It all began in 2019, when we both felt deeply about how lucky we stand to witness the joys of our lives, while there were plenty other innocent ones who just weren't. It was then when we realised the need to create something that could help fight the helplessness of our fellow Indians.
With 'The Organic Treasure', we strive to create a pure, genuine & home-grown brand that could make organic food approachable to each & every Indian household by creating a healthy competition through a transparent & simple platform with most affordable & reasonable prices. We aspire to make Indians stronger and healthier from within to fight every possible odd.

settings.html: With 'The Organic Treasure' , we strive to create an innate, sustainable & consciously curated home-grown brand that could provide a happy place to Indian organic farmers, local artisans & craftsmen. For every purchase that you make, we contribute 1% to support local businesses & to give them a fair pay for their blood & sweat.
Brands Available on our website:

LET'S THRIVE TOGETHER!

Every time you buy from us, you help pull back carbon from atmosphere to the soil & ensure a fair pay to our Indian farmers who work tirelessly in an effort so we don't sleep empty stomach. Together we sustain, together we create!

settings.title: 'Our Roots are cultured by our Tradition!'
settings.content: The Ramayana says, ''All dead things-rotting corpse or Stinking garbage returned to earth are transferred into wholesome things that nourish life. Such is the alchemy of mother earth!". We strive to preserve our mother by routing our compassion towards our heroic Indian soil & saviour environment :)
